source.name: HaPU PA
source.description: Hospital-acquired conditions data on 3,361 US hospitals, released by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) in April 2011. Data based on Medicare claims; covers patients who were discharged from the hospital between October 1, 2008 and June 30, 2010. Formatted and presented by the Sunlight Foundation.
